backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the FlightLog app implementing user profile management, category CRUD (students, instructors, aircraft, exercises), and flight log entry operations with role-based access control via a MixinAuthorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two bug-fix features — fixing the useEditFlightEntry mutation hook and the delete confirmation dialog in FlightRecordsTable — to their relevant source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose, recent changes, and role within the aviation-themed FlightLog React application.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the FlightLog Vite/React app, mounting the React root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with 8 routes, wraps the app in QueryClient and ThemeProvider, handles authentication gating, and shows a ProfileSetupModal for first-time users.
frontend/src/components/EditFlightEntryM: Modal dialog component for editing an existing flight log entry, pre-populating form fields from the selected entry and submitting updates via the useEditFlightEntry mutation hook with client-side validation.
frontend/src/components/FlightRecordsTab: Renders a paginated table of flight log entries with edit and delete actions, using a confirmation dialog for deletions and an edit modal for updates.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky app header with logo, current page title, desktop/mobile navigation links, user profile display, and logout functionality via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ListManager.tsx: Generic CRUD list manager component for category items (students, aircraft, etc.) supporting add, inline edit, and delete with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Full-screen login page with a background image, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity sign-in button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and save a pilot profile before accessing the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the currently authenticated user's profile from the backend actor, gating execution until the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and persisting identity via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including flight entries, categories, user profiles, aircraft, and student hours.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining an aviation-themed dark navy design system with Tailwind, custom CSS variables, component styles, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AircraftPage.tsx: Page for managing the aircraft fleet, displaying total flight hours per aircraft and a list manager for adding/removing aircraft.
frontend/src/pages/ExercisesPage.tsx: Page for managing training exercises using a ListManager component, allowing users to add or remove exercises used in flight log entries.
frontend/src/pages/FlightLogEntryPage.ts: Form page for creating new flight log entries, collecting fields like date, student, instructor, aircraft, exercise, and flight times with validation.
frontend/src/pages/FlightRecordsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable, paginated table of all flight entries with month and student name filters, and supports exporting the filtered results to an Excel file.
frontend/src/pages/InstructorsPage.tsx: Page for managing the instructor roster, wrapping the ListManager component configured for the 'instructor' category type.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Dashboard home page showing a welcome banner, today's and current month's flight hour stats, and a navigation tile grid linking to all major app sections.
frontend/src/pages/StudentReportPage.tsx: Displays a ranked table of students sorted by total flight hours, with a grand total footer, loading skeletons, and error/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/StudentsPage.tsx: Page for managing the student roster, wrapping the ListManager component configured for the 'student' category type.
frontend/src/utils/excelExport.ts: Generates and downloads a valid .xlsx file from flight entry data by manually constructing the Open XML ZIP structure with CRC32 and deflate logic without external dependencies.
frontend/src/utils/timeCalculations.ts: Provides utility functions for calculating flight duration from HH:MM strings (with midnight-crossing support), converting date strings to BigInt nanosecond epochs, and formatting decimal hours as H:MM.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color palettes (navy, sky, sidebar, chart), typography plugins, container queries, and animation support.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for FlightLog describing known issues with flight record update/delete operations and tracking pending backend fixes (AR-1, AR-2) alongside existing frontend fix features.
